entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
